name: F1 Super Battle
overview:
F-1 Super Battle was produced by Jaleco in 1994.

COlorful F-1 racing game made by Jaleco around 1994. Choose between 3 race courses: Belgium , France , USA. Belgium is the hardest track while the USA is the easiest. Race against 7 other cars as you try to reach each checkpoint on your way to completing 3 laps. Face challenges such as hair pin turns and rain.

F-1 Super Battle is basically a Grand Prix Star game in all but name and system board.
